subject: My order
description_text:
Hello,

I have made an order and paid for express shipping around a week ago. The parcel tracking is showing that they have been sat in the same place for the past 5 days.

conversations.body_text: Hi Matthew Woodward,    We will follow up on your behalf, please don't worry.

Hi,

Okay can you let me know an update please?


On Mon, 13 Oct 2025 at 11:24, service@simsonn.com
Hello, the courier service has confirmed that there are no issues with the delivery, and it is expected to arrive on the 16th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045960045061

Looking at the tracking you have said my parcel is due today but itâ€™s not
even in my country as of yet.

On Tue, 14 Oct 2025 at 07:26, service@simsonn.com
Hi Matthew Woodward,   We sincerely apologise for the delay caused. We shall investigate the reason for the delay and refund your additional express delivery charges.
